## ExtractReplacementDeps type

Extract deps from all replacement modules and merge them.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ExtractReplacementDeps<M> = ExtractDepsFromModule<ExtractReplacements<M>>;
```
**References:** [ExtractDepsFromModule](../extractdepsfrommodule/)<!-- -->, [ExtractReplacements](../extractreplacements/)
